summary: Replaces regular Chaurus Flier from Dawnguard DLC with new textures and modified skeleton, making them look like Nui Rama
descriptionHtml:
Creating complete new animal is not easy, so I decided to simply retexture Chaurus Hunter and change a bit their skeleton proportions, so they look like Nui Ramas - a dragonfly-like creatures from BIONICLE. Includes two versions with lime green and orange textures.

Installation: extract contents of archive to Skyrim/Data folder

This small addon is optional for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41838/?]Bionicle Toa Races mod[/url]

RequiresÂ Downguard DLC
author: Aresnir
